message: Shades of Richard Nixon.

The issue is not WHO is running. The issue is are WE going to become and remain vigilant citizens who prioritize our politics and culture and rights, over television and instant gratification? It's up to us, why aren't you doing articles on voting and the lack there of, and the low numbers that turn out? Why aren't you doing stories on the need to be involved all the time, and to demand accountability from all elected officials?

In Pharoahs day, both the Arabs and the Jews were Black Africans. There were never any white people enslaved in Egypt. But there were Black slaves in Egypt. Had there been whites enslaved in Egypt for 400 years, they would have surely documented it. How is it Egyptians documented black slaves; but never showed any white slaves. Because the Israelite slaves of Egypt were themselves Egyptians and Ethiopians and Nubians.
